short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
description: This is a notification of a Request for Proposal notice regarding the replacement of plumbing stacks and fixtures at the Saskatchewan Penitentiary in Prince Albert, SK. Three (3) plumbing stacks and six (6) stainless steel combination fixtures are required.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Information

* **Tender Title**: EV385-241147 - Plumbing Stack Replacement - Saskatchewan Penitentiary
* **Reference Number**: WS4285489306-Doc4352769257
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4285489306
* **Publication Date**: January 9, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2024, 2:00 pm EST

### Tender Details

* **Project Nature**: Replacement of existing plumbing stacks and porcelain plumbing fixtures at the Saskatchewan Penitentiary, Prince Albert, SK.
* **Supplier Requirements**: Manufacturer and installation of three (3) plumbing stacks and six (6) stainless steel combination plumbing fixtures with flush valves.
* **Additional Responsibilities**: Contractor is responsible for applying for and costs associated with building and associated permits.
* **Location**: Saskatchewan Penitentiary, Prince Albert, Saskatchewan

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Goods and Services**: Plumbing construction services (UNSPSC Code: 72151100)

### Cancellations

This tender is cancelled due to... [no relevant information given by the contractor, assuming this would not be empty information for a government tender]

### Important Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Mike Fagan (SPAC/PSPC) 
* **Contact E-mail**: mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Access to Tender Documents

Please visit the following link to access the tender notice: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18272154](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18272154)


(Note that I have not made any additions. If some relevant information is missing (e.g due to the contradiction between the two languages), it might be good to either request this information from the contractor or ignore the two-language information)

Please let me know if you have any further questions.
